;;;232    //								BtnCount.Left = _aButtonData[i].xPos;
;;;233    //								BtnCount.Top = _aButtonData[i].yPos+200;
;;;234    //								BtnCount.Height = _aButtonData[i].ySize;
;;;235    //								BtnCount.Width = _aButtonData[i].xSize;
;;;236    //								BtnCount.Focus = 0;	/* 失去焦点 */
;;;237    //								BtnCount.acLabel =  _aButtonData[i].acLabel;
;;;238    //								BtnCount.acLabel1 =  _aButtonData[i].acLabel1;
;;;239    //								BtnCount.Control =  _aButtonData[i].Control;
;;;240    //								if(s_CapsLock)
;;;241    //								{
;;;242    //									BtnCount.pCaption = _aButtonData[i].acLabel;
;;;243    //								}
;;;244    //								else
;;;245    //								{
;;;246    //									BtnCount.pCaption = _aButtonData[i].acLabel1;
;;;247    //								}
;;;248    //								LCD_DrawButton(&BtnCount);
;;;249    //							}
;;;250    //							s_CapsLock=~s_CapsLock;		
;;;251    //						}
;;;252    //						break;
;;;253    //					case 45://中英文切换
;;;254    //						/* 当前是英文，必须是小写字母的时候才可以切换  */
;;;255    //						if((s_SelectLangue == 1)&&(s_CapsLock == 0))
;;;256    //						{
;;;257    //							s_SelectLangue = 0;
;;;258    //							BtnCount.Left = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].xPos;
;;;259    //							BtnCount.Top = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].yPos+200;
;;;260    //							BtnCount.Height = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].ySize;
;;;261    //							BtnCount.Width = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].xSize;
;;;262    //							BtnCount.Focus = 0;	/* 失去焦点 */
;;;263    //							BtnCount.acLabel =  _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel;
;;;264    //							BtnCount.acLabel1 =  _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel1;
;;;265    //							BtnCount.Control =  _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].Control;
;;;266    //							strcpy(ch,"中");
;;;267    //							BtnCount.pCaption = ch;
;;;268    //							LCD_DrawButton(&BtnCount);
;;;269    //						}
;;;270    //						else if((s_SelectLangue == 0)&&(s_CapsLock == 0))
;;;271    //						{
;;;272    //							s_SelectLangue = 1;
;;;273    //							BtnCount.Left = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].xPos;
;;;274    //							BtnCount.Top = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].yPos+200;
;;;275    //							BtnCount.Height = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].ySize;
;;;276    //							BtnCount.Width = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].xSize;
;;;277    //							BtnCount.Focus = 0;	/* 失去焦点 */
;;;278    //							BtnCount.acLabel =  _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel;
;;;279    //							BtnCount.acLabel1 =  _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel1;
;;;280    //							BtnCount.Control =  _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].Control;
;;;281    //							strcpy(ch,"英");
;;;282    //							BtnCount.pCaption = ch;
;;;283    //							LCD_DrawButton(&BtnCount);
;;;284    //						}
;;;285    //						break;
;;;286    //					default: break;
;;;287    //				}
;;;288    				/* 第三步：字母大小写的识别 ********************************************/
;;;289    				if(s_CapsLock == 0)
0001ea  488b              LDR      r0,|L2.1048|
0001ec  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_CapsLock
0001ee  b958              CBNZ     r0,|L2.520|
;;;290    				{
;;;291    					s_Key = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel[0];
0001f0  4887              LDR      r0,|L2.1040|
0001f2  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; BUTTON_Num
0001f4  ebc000c0          RSB      r0,r0,r0,LSL #3
0001f8  4984              LDR      r1,|L2.1036|
0001fa  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
0001fe  6900              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x10]
000200  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000202  4986              LDR      r1,|L2.1052|
000204  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
000206  e00a              B        |L2.542|
                  |L2.520|
;;;292    				}
;;;293    				/* 大写字母 */
;;;294    				else
;;;295    				{
;;;296    					s_Key = _aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel1[0];
000208  4881              LDR      r0,|L2.1040|
00020a  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; BUTTON_Num
00020c  ebc000c0          RSB      r0,r0,r0,LSL #3
000210  497e              LDR      r1,|L2.1036|
000212  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
000216  6940              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x14]
000218  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
00021a  4980              LDR      r1,|L2.1052|
00021c  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L2.542|
;;;297    				}
;;;298    
;;;299    				/* 第四步：中文处理 **************************************************/
;;;300    				if(s_SelectLangue == 0)
00021e  4880              LDR      r0,|L2.1056|
000220  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_SelectLangue
000222  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000224  d170              BNE      |L2.776|
;;;301    				{		
;;;302    					int j;
;;;303    					char *ptr;
;;;304    
;;;305    					/* 按键1按下***********************************************************/
;;;306    					if(s_Key == '1')
000226  487d              LDR      r0,|L2.1052|
000228  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Key
00022a  2831              CMP      r0,#0x31
00022c  d16d              BNE      |L2.778|
;;;307    					{
;;;308    						/* 如果左侧有未显示的汉字 */
;;;309    						if(s_LeftFlag == 1)
00022e  487d              LDR      r0,|L2.1060|
000230  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_LeftFlag
000232  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000234  d16a              BNE      |L2.780|
;;;310    						{
;;;311    							/* 因为每行最多可以显示7个汉字，所以出现数字7的地方很多 */
;;;312    							if(s_Hzoff%7 == 0)
000236  487c              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
000238  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00023a  2107              MOVS     r1,#7
00023c  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
000240  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000244  b928              CBNZ     r0,|L2.594|
;;;313    							{
;;;314    								s_Hzoff -= 7;	
000246  4878              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
000248  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00024a  1fc0              SUBS     r0,r0,#7
00024c  4976              LDR      r1,|L2.1064|
00024e  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
000250  e00b              B        |L2.618|
                  |L2.594|
;;;315    							}
;;;316    							else
;;;317    							{
;;;318    								s_Hzoff = s_Hzoff - (s_Hzoff % 7);	
000252  4875              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
000254  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000256  2107              MOVS     r1,#7
000258  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
00025c  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000260  4971              LDR      r1,|L2.1064|
000262  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000264  1a08              SUBS     r0,r1,r0
000266  4970              LDR      r1,|L2.1064|
000268  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L2.618|
;;;319    							}
;;;320    							
;;;321    							s_Hzoff -= 7;
00026a  486f              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
00026c  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00026e  1fc0              SUBS     r0,r0,#7
000270  496d              LDR      r1,|L2.1064|
000272  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;322    
;;;323    							s_RightFlag = 1;
000274  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000276  496d              LDR      r1,|L2.1068|
000278  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;324    
;;;325    							/* 如果偏移地址之前还有7个以上的汉字 */
;;;326    							if(s_Hzoff >= 7)
00027a  486b              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
00027c  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00027e  2807              CMP      r0,#7
000280  db3d              BLT      |L2.766|
;;;327    							{
;;;328    								s_Bufview[0] = '1';
000282  2031              MOVS     r0,#0x31
000284  496a              LDR      r1,|L2.1072|
000286  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;329    								s_Bufview[1] = '<';
000288  203c              MOVS     r0,#0x3c
00028a  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;330    								s_Bufview[2] = ' ';
00028c  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00028e  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;331    								
;;;332    								for (j = 0; j < 7;j++)
000290  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
000292  e025              B        |L2.736|
                  |L2.660|
;;;333    								{
;;;334    									s_Bufview[j*4+3] = j+'2';
000294  f1040032          ADD      r0,r4,#0x32
000298  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
00029a  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
00029e  4a64              LDR      r2,|L2.1072|
0002a0  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;335    									s_Bufview[j*4+4] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2];
0002a2  4861              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
0002a4  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0002a6  4963              LDR      r1,|L2.1076|
0002a8  f8110010          LDRB     r0,[r1,r0,LSL #1]
0002ac  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
0002ae  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
0002b2  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;336    									s_Bufview[j*4+5] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+1];
0002b4  485c              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
0002b6  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0002b8  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
0002ba  eb010040          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #1
0002be  495d              LDR      r1,|L2.1076|
0002c0  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
0002c2  2105              MOVS     r1,#5
0002c4  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
0002c8  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;337    //											s_Bufview[j*4+6] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+2];
;;;338    									s_Bufview[j*4+6] = ' ';
0002ca  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
0002cc  2106              MOVS     r1,#6
0002ce  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
0002d2  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;339    									s_Hzoff++;
0002d4  4854              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
0002d6  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0002d8  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0002da  4953              LDR      r1,|L2.1064|
0002dc  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
0002de  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;332
                  |L2.736|
0002e0  2c07              CMP      r4,#7                 ;332
0002e2  dbd7              BLT      |L2.660|
;;;340    								}
;;;341    
;;;342    								s_Bufview[31] = '9';
0002e4  2039              MOVS     r0,#0x39
0002e6  4952              LDR      r1,|L2.1072|
0002e8  77c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#0x1f]
;;;343    								s_Bufview[32] = '>';
0002ea  203e              MOVS     r0,#0x3e
0002ec  f8810020          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x20]
;;;344    								s_Bufview[33] = 0;
0002f0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0002f2  f8810021          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x21]
;;;345    								s_LeftFlag = 1;
0002f6  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0002f8  494a              LDR      r1,|L2.1060|
0002fa  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
0002fc  e0ae              B        |L2.1116|
                  |L2.766|
;;;346    							}
;;;347    							/* 如果偏移地址之前汉字数小于7 */
;;;348    							else
;;;349    							{	
;;;350    								s_LeftFlag = 0;
0002fe  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000300  4948              LDR      r1,|L2.1060|
000302  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;351    								for (j = 0; j < 7;j++)
000304  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
000306  e028              B        |L2.858|
                  |L2.776|
000308  e3ef              B        |L2.2794|
                  |L2.778|
00030a  e0b8              B        |L2.1150|
                  |L2.780|
00030c  e02f              B        |L2.878|
                  |L2.782|
;;;352    								{
;;;353    									s_Bufview[j*4+0] = j+'1';
00030e  f1040031          ADD      r0,r4,#0x31
000312  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000314  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
000318  4a45              LDR      r2,|L2.1072|
00031a  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;354    									s_Bufview[j*4+1] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2];
00031c  4842              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
00031e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000320  4944              LDR      r1,|L2.1076|
000322  f8110010          LDRB     r0,[r1,r0,LSL #1]
000326  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000328  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
00032c  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;355    									s_Bufview[j*4+2] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+1];
00032e  483e              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
000330  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000332  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000334  eb010040          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #1
000338  493e              LDR      r1,|L2.1076|
00033a  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
00033c  2102              MOVS     r1,#2
00033e  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
000342  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;356    //											s_Bufview[j*4+3] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+2];
;;;357    									s_Bufview[j*4+3] = ' ';
000344  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
000346  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
000348  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
00034c  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;358    									s_Hzoff++;//
00034e  4836              LDR      r0,|L2.1064|
000350  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000352  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
000354  4934              LDR      r1,|L2.1064|
000356  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
000358  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;351
                  |L2.858|
00035a  2c07              CMP      r4,#7                 ;351
00035c  dbd7              BLT      |L2.782|
;;;359    								}
;;;360    
;;;361    								s_Bufview[28] = '8';
00035e  2038              MOVS     r0,#0x38
000360  4933              LDR      r1,|L2.1072|
000362  7708              STRB     r0,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;362    								s_Bufview[29] = '>';
000364  203e              MOVS     r0,#0x3e
000366  7748              STRB     r0,[r1,#0x1d]
;;;363    								s_Bufview[30] = '\0';
000368  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00036a  7788              STRB     r0,[r1,#0x1e]
00036c  e076              B        |L2.1116|
                  |L2.878|
;;;364    							}
;;;365    						}
;;;366    						/* 左侧没有汉字，直接显示第一个汉字 */
;;;367    						else
;;;368    						{
;;;369    							s_Textbuf[0+2*s_Text] = s_Hzbuf[0];
00036e  4831              LDR      r0,|L2.1076|
000370  7801              LDRB     r1,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzbuf
000372  4831              LDR      r0,|L2.1080|
000374  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
000376  4a31              LDR      r2,|L2.1084|
000378  f8021010          STRB     r1,[r2,r0,LSL #1]
;;;370    							s_Textbuf[1+2*s_Text] = s_Hzbuf[1];
00037c  482d              LDR      r0,|L2.1076|
00037e  7841              LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; s_Hzbuf
000380  482d              LDR      r0,|L2.1080|
000382  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
000384  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000386  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
000388  5411              STRB     r1,[r2,r0]
;;;371    //									s_Textbuf[2] = s_Hzbuf[2];
;;;372    							s_Textbuf[2+2*s_Text] = '\0';
00038a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00038c  482a              LDR      r0,|L2.1080|
00038e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
000390  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
000392  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2
000394  5411              STRB     r1,[r2,r0]
;;;373    //								MULTIEDIT_AddText(hMulti, s_Textbuf);
;;;374    							LCD_Fill_Rect(5,10,25,800,CL_WHITE);	
000396  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
00039a  f44f7348          MOV      r3,#0x320
00039e  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
0003a0  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
0003a2  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0003a4  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0003a6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;375    							LCD_DispStr(5, 10, s_Textbuf, &FontB);//显示选择的汉字	
0003aa  4b25              LDR      r3,|L2.1088|
0003ac  4a23              LDR      r2,|L2.1084|
0003ae  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
0003b0  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0003b2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;376    							if(s_Hzbuf[0]!=0)s_Text++;	
0003b6  481f              LDR      r0,|L2.1076|
0003b8  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzbuf
0003ba  b120              CBZ      r0,|L2.966|
0003bc  481e              LDR      r0,|L2.1080|
0003be  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
0003c0  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0003c2  491d              LDR      r1,|L2.1080|
0003c4  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L2.966|
;;;377    							for(i=0;i<34;i++)
0003c6  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
0003c8  e008              B        |L2.988|
                  |L2.970|
;;;378    							{
;;;379    								s_tempbuf[i]= '\0';	
0003ca  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0003cc  491d              LDR      r1,|L2.1092|
0003ce  5548              STRB     r0,[r1,r5]
;;;380    								s_Bufview[i]= '\0';

;;;381    								s_Hzbuf[i]='\0';
0003d4  4917              LDR      r1,|L2.1076|

0003da  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;377
                  |L2.988|
0003dc  2d22              CMP      r5,#0x22              ;377
0003de  dbf4              BLT      |L2.970|
;;;382    							}
;;;383    							s_Offset=0;
0003e0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0003e2  4919              LDR      r1,|L2.1096|
0003e4  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;384    							LCD_Fill_Rect(5,155,25,500,CL_WHITE);	
0003e6  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
0003ea  f44f73fa          MOV      r3,#0x1f4
0003ee  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
0003f0  219b              MOVS     r1,#0x9b
0003f2  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0003f4  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0003f6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;385    							LCD_Fill_Rect(5,180,25,700,M_BACKGROUND_COLOR);		
0003fa  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
0003fe  e025              B        |L2.1100|
                  |L2.1024|

                  |L2.1028|
                          DCD      tpX
                  |L2.1032|
                          DCD      ucTouch
                  |L2.1036|
                          DCD      _aButtonData
                  |L2.1040|

                  |L2.1044|
                          DCD      BtnCount
                  |L2.1048|
                          DCD      s_CapsLock
                  |L2.1052|
                          DCD      s_Key
                  |L2.1056|

                  |L2.1060|
                          DCD      s_LeftFlag
                  |L2.1064|

                  |L2.1068|
                          DCD      s_RightFlag
                  |L2.1072|
                          DCD      s_Bufview
                  |L2.1076|
                          DCD      s_Hzbuf
                  |L2.1080|
                          DCD      s_Text
                  |L2.1084|
                          DCD      s_Textbuf
                  |L2.1088|
                          DCD      FontB
                  |L2.1092|
                          DCD      s_tempbuf
                  |L2.1096|
                          DCD      s_Offset
                  |L2.1100|
00044c  f44f732f          MOV      r3,#0x2bc
000450  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
000452  21b4              MOVS     r1,#0xb4
000454  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000456  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
000458  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
                  |L2.1116|
;;;386    						}							
;;;387    //							TEXT_SetText(ahText[1],s_Bufview);
;;;388    						LCD_Fill_Rect(5,180,25,700,M_BACKGROUND_COLOR);
00045c  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000460  f44f732f          MOV      r3,#0x2bc
000464  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
000466  21b4              MOVS     r1,#0xb4
000468  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00046a  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
00046c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;389    						LCD_DispStr(5, 180, s_Bufview, &FontB);//显示预选汉字
000470  4bfd              LDR      r3,|L2.2152|
000472  4afe              LDR      r2,|L2.2156|
000474  21b4              MOVS     r1,#0xb4
000476  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
000478  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
00047c  e3db              B        |L2.3126|
                  |L2.1150|
;;;390    					}
;;;391    					/* 按键8按下***********************************************************/
;;;392    					else if(s_Key == '8')
00047e  48fc              LDR      r0,|L2.2160|
000480  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Key
000482  2838              CMP      r0,#0x38
000484  d17e              BNE      |L2.1412|
;;;393    					{
;;;394    						if(s_LeftFlag == 1)
000486  48fb              LDR      r0,|L2.2164|
000488  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_LeftFlag
00048a  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00048c  d163              BNE      |L2.1366|
;;;395    						{
;;;396    							if(s_Hzoff%7 == 0)
00048e  48fa              LDR      r0,|L2.2168|
000490  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000492  2107              MOVS     r1,#7
000494  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
000498  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
00049c  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00049e  d159              BNE      |L2.1364|
;;;397    							{							
;;;398    								s_Textbuf[0+2*s_Text] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff-1)*2];
0004a0  48f5              LDR      r0,|L2.2168|
0004a2  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0004a4  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0004a6  49f5              LDR      r1,|L2.2172|
0004a8  f8111010          LDRB     r1,[r1,r0,LSL #1]
0004ac  48f4              LDR      r0,|L2.2176|
0004ae  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
0004b0  4af4              LDR      r2,|L2.2180|
0004b2  f8021010          STRB     r1,[r2,r0,LSL #1]
;;;399    								s_Textbuf[1+2*s_Text] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff-1)*2+1];
0004b6  48f0              LDR      r0,|L2.2168|
0004b8  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0004ba  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0004bc  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
0004be  eb010040          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #1
0004c2  49ee              LDR      r1,|L2.2172|
0004c4  5c09              LDRB     r1,[r1,r0]
0004c6  48ee              LDR      r0,|L2.2176|
0004c8  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
0004ca  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0004cc  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0004ce  5411              STRB     r1,[r2,r0]
;;;400    //									s_Textbuf[2] = s_Hzbuf[2];
;;;401    								s_Textbuf[2+2*s_Text] = '\0';
0004d0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0004d2  48eb              LDR      r0,|L2.2176|
0004d4  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
0004d6  0040              LSLS     r0,r0,#1
0004d8  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2
0004da  5411              STRB     r1,[r2,r0]
;;;402    //								MULTIEDIT_AddText(hMulti, s_Textbuf);
;;;403    								LCD_Fill_Rect(5,10,25,800,CL_WHITE);	
0004dc  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
0004e0  f44f7348          MOV      r3,#0x320
0004e4  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
0004e6  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
0004e8  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0004ea  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0004ec  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;404    								LCD_DispStr(5, 10, s_Textbuf, &FontB);//显示选择的汉字	
0004f0  4bdd              LDR      r3,|L2.2152|
0004f2  4ae4              LDR      r2,|L2.2180|
0004f4  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
0004f6  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0004f8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
;;;405    								if(s_Hzbuf[0]!=0)s_Text++;	
0004fc  48df              LDR      r0,|L2.2172|
0004fe  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzbuf
000500  b120              CBZ      r0,|L2.1292|
000502  48df              LDR      r0,|L2.2176|
000504  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
000506  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
000508  49dd              LDR      r1,|L2.2176|
00050a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L2.1292|
;;;406    								for(i=0;i<34;i++)
00050c  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
00050e  e008              B        |L2.1314|
                  |L2.1296|
;;;407    								{
;;;408    									s_tempbuf[i]= '\0';	
000510  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000512  49dd              LDR      r1,|L2.2184|
000514  5548              STRB     r0,[r1,r5]
;;;409    									s_Bufview[i]= '\0';

;;;410    									s_Hzbuf[i]='\0';

000520  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;406
                  |L2.1314|
000522  2d22              CMP      r5,#0x22              ;406
000524  dbf4              BLT      |L2.1296|
;;;411    								}
;;;412    								s_Offset=0;
000526  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000528  49d8              LDR      r1,|L2.2188|
00052a  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;413    								LCD_Fill_Rect(5,155,25,500,CL_WHITE);	
00052c  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000530  f44f73fa          MOV      r3,#0x1f4

000538  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00053a  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
00053c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;414    								LCD_Fill_Rect(5,180,25,700,M_BACKGROUND_COLOR);												
000540  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000544  f44f732f          MOV      r3,#0x2bc
000548  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
00054a  21b4              MOVS     r1,#0xb4

000550  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
                  |L2.1364|
000554  e083              B        |L2.1630|
                  |L2.1366|
;;;415    							}
;;;416    						}
;;;417    						else
;;;418    						{
;;;419    							if(s_RightFlag == 1)	//1表示当前条目右侧有未显示汉字
000556  48ce              LDR      r0,|L2.2192|
000558  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_RightFlag
00055a  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00055c  d17f              BNE      |L2.1630|
;;;420    							{
;;;421    								s_LeftFlag = 1;
00055e  49c5              LDR      r1,|L2.2164|
000560  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;422    								s_Bufview[0] = '1';
000562  2031              MOVS     r0,#0x31
000564  49c1              LDR      r1,|L2.2156|
000566  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;423    								s_Bufview[1] = '<';
000568  203c              MOVS     r0,#0x3c
00056a  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;424    								s_Bufview[2] = ' ';		
00056c  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00056e  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;425    								if (s_Hznum <= (s_Hzoff + 7))
000570  48c8              LDR      r0,|L2.2196|
000572  8801              LDRH     r1,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hznum
000574  48c0              LDR      r0,|L2.2168|
000576  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000578  1dc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#7
00057a  4281              CMP      r1,r0
00057c  dc39              BGT      |L2.1522|
;;;426    								{
;;;427    									int k = s_Hznum - s_Hzoff;
00057e  49c5              LDR      r1,|L2.2196|
000580  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hznum
000582  e000              B        |L2.1414|
                  |L2.1412|
000584  e07c              B        |L2.1664|
                  |L2.1414|
000586  4abc              LDR      r2,|L2.2168|
000588  8812              LDRH     r2,[r2,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00058a  1a88              SUBS     r0,r1,r2
;;;428    									for (j = 0; j < k;j++)
00058c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00058e  e025              B        |L2.1500|
                  |L2.1424|
;;;429    									{
;;;430    										s_Bufview[j*4+3] = j+'2';
000590  f1040132          ADD      r1,r4,#0x32
000594  2203              MOVS     r2,#3
000596  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
00059a  4bb4              LDR      r3,|L2.2156|
00059c  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;431    										s_Bufview[j*4+4] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2];
00059e  49b6              LDR      r1,|L2.2168|
0005a0  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0005a2  4ab6              LDR      r2,|L2.2172|
0005a4  f8121011          LDRB     r1,[r2,r1,LSL #1]
0005a8  2204              MOVS     r2,#4
0005aa  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
0005ae  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;432    										s_Bufview[j*4+5] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+1];
0005b0  49b1              LDR      r1,|L2.2168|
0005b2  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0005b4  2201              MOVS     r2,#1
0005b6  eb020141          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #1
0005ba  4ab0              LDR      r2,|L2.2172|
0005bc  5c51              LDRB     r1,[r2,r1]
0005be  2205              MOVS     r2,#5
0005c0  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
0005c4  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;433    //											s_Bufview[j*4+6] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+2];
;;;434    										s_Bufview[j*4+6] = ' ';
0005c6  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
0005c8  2206              MOVS     r2,#6
0005ca  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
0005ce  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;435    										s_Hzoff++;
0005d0  49a9              LDR      r1,|L2.2168|
0005d2  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0005d4  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
0005d6  4aa8              LDR      r2,|L2.2168|
0005d8  8011              STRH     r1,[r2,#0]
0005da  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;428
                  |L2.1500|
0005dc  4284              CMP      r4,r0                 ;428
0005de  dbd7              BLT      |L2.1424|
;;;436    									}
;;;437    									s_Bufview[k*4+3] = '\0';	
0005e0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0005e2  2203              MOVS     r2,#3
0005e4  eb020280          ADD      r2,r2,r0,LSL #2
0005e8  4ba0              LDR      r3,|L2.2156|
0005ea  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;438    									s_RightFlag = 0;
0005ec  4aa8              LDR      r2,|L2.2192|
0005ee  7011              STRB     r1,[r2,#0]
;;;439    								}
0005f0  e035              B        |L2.1630|
                  |L2.1522|
;;;440    								else
;;;441    								{
;;;442    									for (j = 0; j < 7;j++)

                  |L2.1526|
;;;443    									{
;;;444    										s_Bufview[j*4+3] = j + '2';

0005fc  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
000600  4a9a              LDR      r2,|L2.2156|
000602  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;445    										s_Bufview[j*4+4] = s_Hzbuf[s_Hzoff*2];

000606  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000608  499c              LDR      r1,|L2.2172|
00060a  f8110010          LDRB     r0,[r1,r0,LSL #1]

000610  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
000614  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;446    										s_Bufview[j*4+5] = s_Hzbuf[s_Hzoff*2+1];
000616  4898              LDR      r0,|L2.2168|
000618  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00061a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00061c  eb010040          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #1
000620  4996              LDR      r1,|L2.2172|
000622  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000624  2105              MOVS     r1,#5
000626  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
00062a  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;447    //												s_Bufview[j*4+6] = s_Hzbuf[s_Hzoff*2+2];
;;;448    										s_Bufview[j*4+6] = ' ';

000630  eb010184          ADD      r1,r1,r4,LSL #2
000634  5450              STRB     r0,[r2,r1]
;;;449    										s_Hzoff++;

000638  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00063a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1

                  |L2.1602|

000644  dbd7              BLT      |L2.1526|
;;;450    									}
;;;451

                  |L2.1630|
;;;457    								}
;;;458    							}
;;;459    						}
;;;460    //							TEXT_SetText(ahText[1],s_Bufview);

000662  f44f732f          MOV      r3,#0x2bc

;;;462    						LCD_DispStr(5, 180, s_Bufview, &FontB);//显示预选汉字

000676  21b4              MOVS     r1,#0xb4

;;;463    					}
;;;464    					/* 按键9按下***********************************************************/
;;;465    					else if(s_Key == '9')

000684  2839              CMP      r0,#0x39
000686  d17d              BNE      |L2.1924|
;;;466    					{
;;;467    						if((s_LeftFlag == 1)&&(s_RightFlag == 1))

00068e  d14a              BNE      |L2.1830|
000690  487f              LDR      r0,|L2.2192|
000692  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_RightFlag
000694  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000696  d17f              BNE      |L2.1944|
;;;468    						{
;;;469    							s_LeftFlag = 1;
000698  4976              LDR      r1,|L2.2164|

;;;470    							s_Bufview[0] = '1';

00069e  4973              LDR      r1,|L2.2156|
0006a0  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;471    							s_Bufview[1] = '<';
0006a2  203c              MOVS     r0,#0x3c
0006a4  7048              STRB     r0,[r1,#1]
;;;472    							s_Bufview[2] = ' ';		
0006a6  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
0006a8  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;473    							if (s_Hznum <= (s_Hzoff + 7))
0006aa  487a              LDR      r0,|L2.2196|
0006ac  8801              LDRH     r1,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hznum
0006ae  4872              LDR      r0,|L2.2168|
0006b0  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Hzoff

0006b6  dc37              BGT      |L2.1832|
;;;474    							{
;;;475    								int k = s_Hznum - s_Hzoff;

0006ba  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hznum
0006bc  4a6e              LDR      r2,|L2.2168|
0006be  8812              LDRH     r2,[r2,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0006c0  1a88              SUBS     r0,r1,r2
;;;476    								for (j = 0; j < k;j++)
0006c2  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
0006c4  e025              B        |L2.1810|
                  |L2.1734|
;;;477    								{
;;;478    									s_Bufview[j*4+3] = j+'2';

0006d0  4b66              LDR      r3,|L2.2156|
0006d2  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;479    									s_Bufview[j*4+4] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2];
0006d4  4968              LDR      r1,|L2.2168|
0006d6  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0006d8  4a68              LDR      r2,|L2.2172|
0006da  f8121011          LDRB     r1,[r2,r1,LSL #1]
0006de  2204              MOVS     r2,#4
0006e0  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
0006e4  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;480    									s_Bufview[j*4+5] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+1];
0006e6  4964              LDR      r1,|L2.2168|
0006e8  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
0006ea  2201              MOVS     r2,#1
0006ec  eb020141          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #1
0006f0  4a62              LDR      r2,|L2.2172|
0006f2  5c51              LDRB     r1,[r2,r1]
0006f4  2205              MOVS     r2,#5
0006f6  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
0006fa  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;481    //											s_Bufview[j*4+6] = s_Hzbuf[(s_Hzoff)*2+2];
;;;482    									s_Bufview[j*4+6] = ' ';
0006fc  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
0006fe  2206              MOVS     r2,#6
000700  eb020284          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSL #2
000704  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;483    									s_Hzoff++;
000706  495c              LDR      r1,|L2.2168|
000708  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
00070a  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
00070c  4a5a              LDR      r2,|L2.2168|
00070e  8011              STRH     r1,[r2,#0]
000710  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;476
                  |L2.1810|
000712  4284              CMP      r4,r0                 ;476
000714  dbd7              BLT      |L2.1734|
;;;484    								}
;;;485    								s_Bufview[k*4+3] = 0;

000718  2203              MOVS     r2,#3
00071a  eb020280          ADD      r2,r2,r0,LSL #2
00071e  4b53              LDR      r3,|L2.2156|
000720  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;486    								s_RightFlag = 0;
000722  4a5b              LDR      r2,|L2.2192|
000724  7011              STRB     r1,[r2,#0]
                  |L2.1830|
;;;487    							}
000726  e037              B        |L2.1944|
                  |L2.1832|
;;;488    							else
;;;489    							{
;;;490    								for (j = 0; j < 7;j++)

                  |L2.1836|
;;;491    								{
;;;492    									s_Bufview[j*4+3] = j + '2';

;;;557    							}
;;;558    							s_Offset=0;
0009c2  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0009c4  49a4              LDR      r1,|L2.3160|
0009c6  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;559    							LCD_Fill_Rect(5,155,25,500,CL_WHITE);	
0009c8  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
0009cc  f44f73fa          MOV      r3,#0x1f4
0009d0  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
0009d2  219b              MOVS     r1,#0x9b
0009d4  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0009d6  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0009d8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;560    							LCD_Fill_Rect(5,180,25,700,M_BACKGROUND_COLOR);										
0009dc  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
0009e0  f44f732f          MOV      r3,#0x2bc
0009e4  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
0009e6  21b4              MOVS     r1,#0xb4
0009e8  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
0009ea  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
0009ec  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
0009f0  e121              B        |L2.3126|
                  |L2.2546|
;;;561    						}
;;;562    					}
;;;563    					/* 任意其它按键 ***************************************************/
;;;564    					else
;;;565    					{			
;;;566    						/* 在还没有输入汉字的情况下，对于功能键的处理 */
;;;567    //								if(s_Offset == 0)
;;;568    //								{
;;;569    //									/* 点下回车键 */
;;;570    //									if(strncmp((const char *)_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel, "Enter", sizeof(_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel)) == 0)
;;;571    //									{

;;;573    //										break;
;;;574    //									}
;;;575    //									/* 点下回格键 */

;;;577    //									{

;;;579    ////										LCD_DispStr(5, 10, s_Textbuf, &FontB);//显示预选汉字		
;;;580    //										break;
;;;581    //									}
;;;582    //								}					
;;;583    //							TEXT_SetBkColor(ahText[0],GUI_LIGHTGRAY);
;;;584    						/* 点击回格键*/
;;;585    						if(strncmp((const char *)_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel, "Back", sizeof(_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel)) == 0)
0009f2  499b              LDR      r1,|L2.3168|
0009f4  7809              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0]  ; BUTTON_Num
0009f6  ebc101c1          RSB      r1,r1,r1,LSL #3
0009fa  4a9a              LDR      r2,|L2.3172|
0009fc  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
000a00  2204              MOVS     r2,#4
000a02  6908              LDR      r0,[r1,#0x10]
000a04  a198              ADR      r1,|L2.3176|
000a06  f7fffffe          BL       strncmp
000a0a  bb70              CBNZ     r0,|L2.2666|
;;;586    						{
;;;587    							/* 实现汉字拼音的逐个删除 */
;;;588    							if(s_Offset > 0)
000a0c  4892              LDR      r0,|L2.3160|
000a0e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Offset
000a10  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000a12  dd05              BLE      |L2.2592|
;;;589    							{
;;;590    								s_Offset--;
000a14  4890              LDR      r0,|L2.3160|
000a16  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Offset
000a18  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000a1a  498f              LDR      r1,|L2.3160|
000a1c  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
000a1e  e01e              B        |L2.2654|
                  |L2.2592|
;;;591    							}								
;;;592    							/* 拼音删除完毕，退出汉字和拼音的显示 */
;;;593    							else 
;;;594    							{															
;;;595    								if(s_Text>0)s_Text--;

000a22  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
000a24  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000a26  dd04              BLE      |L2.2610|
000a28  4886              LDR      r0,|L2.3140|
000a2a  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; s_Text
000a2c  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000a2e  4985              LDR      r1,|L2.3140|
000a30  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L2.2610|
;;;596    								s_Textbuf[2*s_Text] = '\0';
000a32  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000a34  4983              LDR      r1,|L2.3140|
000a36  7809              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Text
000a38  4a83              LDR      r2,|L2.3144|
000a3a  f8020011          STRB     r0,[r2,r1,LSL #1]
;;;597    								LCD_Fill_Rect(5,10,25,500,CL_WHITE);
000a3e  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000a42  f44f73fa          MOV      r3,#0x1f4
000a46  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
000a48  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
000a4a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000a4c  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
000a4e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;598    								LCD_DispStr(5, 10, s_Textbuf, &FontB);//显示选择的汉字										
000a52  4b7e              LDR      r3,|L2.3148|
000a54  4a7c              LDR      r2,|L2.3144|
000a56  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
000a58  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
000a5a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DispStr
                  |L2.2654|
;;;599    							}
;;;600    							s_tempbuf[s_Offset]= '\0';
000a5e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000a60  497b              LDR      r1,|L2.3152|

                  |L2.2666|

                  |L2.2668|
;;;601    						}
;;;602    						else if(strncmp((const char *)_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel, "Enter", sizeof(_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel)) == 0)

000a6e  7809              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0]  ; BUTTON_Num
000a70  ebc101c1          RSB      r1,r1,r1,LSL #3

;;;603    						{

                  |L2.2702|
;;;605    						}
;;;606    						else
;;;607    						{
;;;608    							/* 除了上面的两个控制键，输入其它的控制键退出显示 */
;;;609    							if(_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].Control == 1)

000a90  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; BUTTON_Num
000a92  ebc000c0          RSB      r0,r0,r0,LSL #3

;;;611    								break;

                  |L2.2724|
;;;612    							}									
;;;613    							/* 如果是其余拼音，装入缓存 */
;;;614    							s_tempbuf[s_Offset++]= s_Key;

000ab4  4866              LDR      r0,|L2.3152|

                  |L2.2744|
;;;615    						}

;;;617    						LCD_Fill_Rect(5,155,25,500,CL_WHITE);
000ab8  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000abc  f44f73fa          MOV      r3,#0x1f4
000ac0  2219              MOVS     r2,#0x19
000ac2  219b              MOVS     r1,#0x9b
000ac4  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000ac6  2005              MOVS     r0,#5
000ac8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
;;;618    						LCD_DispStr(5, 155,   (char *)s_tempbuf, &FontB);

000ad2  2005              MOVS     r0,#5

000ae2  2e00              CMP      r6,#0
000ae4  d07e              BEQ      |L2.3044|
;;;621    						{
;;;622    							for (j = 0; j < s_Hznum*2; j++)

                  |L2.2794|
000aea  e0a5              B        |L2.3128|
                  |L2.2796|

;;;624    								s_Hzbuf[j] = *ptr++;

;;;625    							}

;;;635    								{
;;;636    									int k = s_Hznum - s_Hzoff;

                  |L2.2874|

;;;640    										s_Bufview[j*4+1] = s_Hzbuf[s_Hzoff*2];

000b4a  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; s_Hzoff
000b4c  4a3c              LDR      r2,|L2.3136|

000b52  2201              MOVS     r2,#1

000b58  5499              STRB     r1,[r3,r2]
;;;641    										s_Bufview[j*4+2] = s_Hzbuf[s_Hzoff*2+1];

000b88  dbd7              BLT      |L2.2874|

000c32  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill_Rect
                  |L2.3126|
;;;672    //								LCD_DispStr(5, 180," ", &FontB);//显示预选汉字
;;;673    						}
;;;674    					}
;;;675    				}/* 字符显示*******************************************************************/
000c36  bf00              NOP      
                  |L2.3128|
;;;676    //				else
;;;677    //				{
;;;678    ////					/* 点击回车键 */
;;;679    ////					if(strncmp((const char *)_aButtonData[Id - BUTTON_Num].acLabel, "Enter", sizeof(_aButtonData[Id - BUTTON_Num].acLabel)) == 0)
;;;680    ////					{
;;;681    ////						MULTIEDIT_AddKey(hMulti, GUI_KEY_ENTER);
;;;682    ////						break;
;;;683    ////					}					
;;;684    //					/* 点击回格键 */
;;;685    //					if(strncmp((const char *)_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel, "Back", sizeof(_aButtonData[BUTTON_Num].acLabel)) == 0)
;;;686    //					{
;;;687    //						if((s_Textbuf[2*s_Text+s_Char]-3)<0x80)
;;;688    //						{
;;;689    //							if((s_Textbuf[2*s_Text+s_Char]-2)<0x80)
;;;690    //							{
;;;691    //								
;;;692    //							}
;;;693    //							else 
;;;694    //							{
;;;695    //								
;;;696    //							}
;;;697    //						}
;;;698    //						break;
;;;699    //					}
;;;700    //					/* 其它按键，但不能是功能键 */
;;;701    //					if(_aButtonData[Id - BUTTON_Num].Control == 0)
;;;702    //					{
;;;703    //						s_Textbuf[2*s_Text+s_Char] = s_Key;
;;;704    //						s_Textbuf[1+2*s_Text+s_Char] = '\0';
;;;705    //						s_Char++;
;;;706    //						LCD_DispStr(5, 10, s_Textbuf, &FontB);//显示选择的汉字	
;;;707    //					}
;;;708    //				}
;;;709    			default: break;
000c38  bf00              NOP      
                  |L2.3130|
000c3a  bf00              NOP      
                  |L2.3132|
000c3c  bf00              NOP                            ;212
                  |L2.3134|
;;;710    		}
;;;711    	}
;;;712    }
000c3e  bd7c              POP      {r2-r6,pc}
;;;713    /*
                          ENDP

                  |L2.3136|
                          DCD      s_Hzbuf
                  |L2.3140|
                          DCD      s_Text
                  |L2.3144|

                  |L2.3172|
                          DCD      _aButtonData
                  |L2.3176|
